user.title: Required: Long-Lived Access Token
user.description:
Chime TTS requires a 'long-lived token' to access TTS audio files from your system.

Please complete the following steps:

 1. Click on your profile from the bottom of the side menu, and scroll to the bottom of your profile page.
 2. Select 'CREATE TOKEN' under the 'Long-Lived Access Tokens' section.
 3. Copy the token text, and paste it below:

error.empty_token: Please enter a valid token string.
